channel.title: How to make a player on login, automatically join 'serv help' CC & other prob
channel.description:
[B][u]THIS IS PROJECT INSANITY[/u][/B]
okay, when a player logs on to the server, I want them to automatically join the server help CC? how could i do it?
[b][u]Other Problem[/u][/b]
Also, how to make a player login with player rights IE: New player logs on, and is mod, or has spawn rights, Something similar to this, Help please.
EDIT: Do i know more than the 12 people that have looked at this thread?

item.title: How to make a player on login, automatically join 'serv help' CC & other prob
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:9, topic:390789”]I am still confused as to why you want players to have mod, but on the login method, just do this:

I don’t want them to be mod i just used that as an example i plan to make a custom player right for regular players.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a player on login, automatically join 'serv help' CC & other prob
item.dc:creator: @smokin_flax smokin flax
item.description:
@smokin_flax wrote:

[quote=“Hells-History, post:7, topic:390789”][quote author=smokin flax link=topic=486732.msg3566844#msg3566844 date=1302724823]
THIS IS PROJECT INSANITY

okay, when a player logs on to the server,
I want them to automatically join the server help CC?
how could i do it?

Other Problem

Also, how to make a player login with player rights
IE: New player logs on, and is mod, or has spawn rights,
Something similar to this, Help please.

EDIT: Do i know more than the 12 people that have looked at this thread?
[/quote]

Instead of having the status, just change player rights to 0, then any one can do the command.[/quote]
I could… ehh i will till i figure out what i want to do.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a player on login, automatically join 'serv help' CC & other prob
item.dc:creator: @Hells-History Hells-History
item.description:
@Hells-History wrote:

[quote=“smokin flax, post:1, topic:390789”]THIS IS PROJECT INSANITY

okay, when a player logs on to the server,
I want them to automatically join the server help CC?
how could i do it?

Other Problem

Also, how to make a player login with player rights
IE: New player logs on, and is mod, or has spawn rights,
Something similar to this, Help please.

EDIT: Do i know more than the 12 people that have looked at this thread?[/quote]

Instead of having the status, just change player rights to 0, then any one can do the command.

Read full topic

[/quote]
